item.title: 中国商人因德龙倒闭而获贷款人支持
item.description: 一家卷入江苏德龙镍业股份有限公司倒闭风波的中国领先大宗商品贸易商已从银行获得价值超过 60 亿美元的信贷支持。【原文：A leading Chinese commodity trader embroiled in the collapse of Jiangsu Delong Nickel Industry Co. has won credit backing from banks worth over $6 billion.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯新订单和销售额因行业普遍放缓而下降
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯股份公司（Thyssenkrupp AG）表示，由于这家濒临破产的钢铁制造商三次下调本财年的业绩预期，其第三季度的新订单和销售额大幅下降。【原文：Thyssenkrupp AG said new orders and sales fell significantly during its third quarter as the ailing steelmaker cut forecasts three times for the current fiscal year.】

item.title: 随着欧洲电气化进程的推进，EON 加大了对能源转型的投入
item.description: 德国公用事业公司 EON SE 在上半年将投资额提高了 20% 以上，因为该公司正在扩建一个庞大的电缆网络，以帮助推动能源转型。【原文：German utility EON SE boosted investments by more than 20% in the first half as the company expands a massive network of cables that’s helping to drive the energy transition.】

item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）公布的第二季度利润高于预期，支持了首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）向股东返还资本和完成瑞士信贷整合的努力。【原文：UBS Group AG posted higher than expected profit in the second quarter, buttressing Chief Executive officer Sergio Ermotti’s efforts to return capital to shareholders and finalize the integration of Credit Suisse.】

item.title: 新元在政策收紧的背景下创下2024年新高
item.description: 新加坡元兑美元扩大涨幅，触及 2024 年新高，原因是当地央行今年相对于美联储将维持更紧缩货币政策的预测利好亚洲货币。【原文：The Singapore dollar extended gains to touch a fresh 2024 high versus the greenback as forecasts for the local central bank to keep a tighter monetary policy relative to the Federal Reserve this year favored the Asian currency.】

item.title: 日本央行加息后日本五年期债券拍卖需求疲软
item.description: 日本拍卖五年期主权债券时，投资者的需求略显疲软，凸显了日本央行上月加息对金融市场的影响。【原文：Japan’s auction of five-year sovereign notes met somewhat weak investor demand, highlighting the impact the central bank’s interest-rate hike last month has had on financial markets.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券和投资委员会（ASIC）副主席表示，将在澳大利亚证券交易所民事诉讼中寻求未来的处罚措施
item.description: 澳大利亚市场监管机构起诉澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司（ASX Ltd.），指控该公司在多年来对一个技术项目的进展和延期表示担忧的过程中发表了误导性言论，澳大利亚市场监管机构计划对该公司进行处罚。【原文：Australia’s markets regulator plans to seek penalties after it sued ASX Ltd. for misleading statements relating to years of concerns over the progress and delays of a technology project.】

item.title: 中国罕见的贷款下降引发对 "资产负债表 "衰退的担忧
item.description: 中国近二十年来首次出现银行贷款收缩，这加剧了人们对这个世界第二大经济体正在走向 "资产负债表衰退 "的担忧，就像几十年前的日本一样。【原文：China’s first bank loan contraction in nearly two decades has fanned fears the world’s No. 2 economy is careening toward a “balance sheet recession” as Japan did decades ago.】

item.title: 国泰航空因盈利困境成为全球减持最多的航空公司股票
item.description: 即使在全球旅游业回暖的情况下，国泰航空仍在努力提高利润，因此国泰航空目前成为全球股价缩水最多的大型航空公司。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. is now the world’s most-shorted major airline stock, as the industry struggles to improve profits even amid a rebound in global tourism.】

item.title: 中国交易商为债券支付溢价以规避监管审查
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，中国的交易商正在为政府债券支付溢价，以规避监管机构对史无前例涨势的控制。【原文：Chinese traders are paying a premium for government bonds to evade regulators seeking to tame an unprecedented rally, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 全球最大钢铁生产商警告将面临 "严重 "行业危机
item.description: 中国钢铁业的主要生产商警告说，中国钢铁业正面临着一场比 2008 年和 2015 年经济衰退更为严重的危机，强调需要保存现金，并将当时的情况比作 "严冬"。【原文：China’s steel industry is facing a crisis more serious than the downturns of 2008 and 2015, the leading producer warned, highlighting a need to preserve cash and likening conditions to a “severe winter.”】

item.title: 中国对铁路和电动汽车的追捧阻碍了节假日汽油需求
item.description: 中国对清洁能源的拥护意味着汽油销售不再像往常那样因节假日出行而增长。【原文：China’s embrace of clean energy means gasoline sales are no longer getting their usual bump from holiday travel.】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老金 Cbus 将对工会丑闻进行调查
item.description: 澳大利亚金融监管机构已下令该国最大的养老基金之一 Cbus 就其与一个面临严重不当行为指控的建筑工会的密切关系进行外部审查。【原文：Australia’s financial watchdog has ordered Cbus, one of the country’s largest pension funds, to conduct an external review related to its close ties to a construction union facing serious allegations of misconduct.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，玛氏接近以 300 亿美元收购零食制造商 Kellanova
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引知情人士的话报道，玛氏公司预计将于周三宣布以近 300 亿美元的价格收购 Kellanova。【原文：Mars Inc. is expected to announce a nearly-$30 billion deal for Kellanova Wednesday, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 菲律宾业务为 Jollibee 带来利润，但中国市场的痛苦仍在持续
item.description: 尽管 Jollibee Foods Corp. 在中国的经营举步维艰，但其菲律宾业务仍提高了该快餐连锁店第二季度的利润。【原文：Jollibee Foods Corp.’s Philippine businesses boosted the fast-food chain’s second-quarter profit, even as it struggled with its operation in China.】

item.title: 销售疲软，万科评级被下调至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 穆迪（Moody's）将中国万科集团股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：Moody’s cut China Vanke Co.’s debt rating deeper into junk territory, underscoring mounting pressure on the state-backed developer as it faces a cash crunch and declining sales.】

item.title: 前高盛合伙人为千禧基金获得香港执照
item.description: 香港证券市场监察机构向一家股票资本市场专业对冲基金颁发了另一张执照，同时加强了对所谓大宗交易的审查。【原文：Hong Kong’s securities markets watchdog has granted another license to an equity capital markets specialist hedge fund, even as it tightens scrutiny over so-called block trades.】

item.title: 札幌就房地产业务征求建议后股价大涨
item.description: 日本酿酒商札幌控股有限公司（Sapporo Holdings Ltd.）表示，迫于激进投资者的压力，该公司将征求外部对其房地产业务投资的建议，此后该公司股价大涨。【原文：Sapporo Holdings Ltd. shares surged after the Japanese brewer said it would solicit proposals for external investment in its real estate business following pressure from activist investors.】

item.title: 假日货物提前抵达，洛杉矶港七月吞吐量创纪录
item.description: 由于零售商急于提早进货，洛杉矶港上个月的集装箱吞吐量超过了有记录以来的任何一个七月。【原文：The Port of Los Angeles processed more container units last month than any other July on record, driven by retailers eager to get their holiday goods in early.】

item.title: 新加坡顶级房地产公司盈利情况显示行业逆风
item.description: 新加坡最大的两家房地产公司周三公布的业绩喜忧参半，高利率和全球房地产放缓影响了上半年的业绩。【原文：Two of Singapore’s largest property companies reported a mixed set of results Wednesday, as high interest rates and a global real estate slowdown weighed on performance in the first half.】

item.title: 香港大亨郑家纯期待香港成为第一富人聚集地
item.description: 香港最富有的家族之一的后代表示，随着香港加大力度吸引和留住更多的亿万富翁及其继承人，他预计香港将成为全球家族办公室的首选目的地。【原文：The scion of one of Hong Kong’s richest families said he expects the city to become the world’s top destination for family offices, as it steps up efforts to lure and retain more billionaires and their heirs.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国股市连续第四天反弹。华尔街模型显示经济衰退几率上升。星巴克更换首席执行官后大涨。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US stocks rally for a fourth day. Wall Street models flash higher chances of recession. Starbucks surges after replacing CEO. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 行业报告指出美国减少石油库存后石油价格上涨
item.description: 由于一份行业报告指出美国原油库存大幅下降，加上中东紧张局势仍在持续，石油价格在周二下跌超过 2% 后出现上涨。【原文：Oil rose — after falling more than 2% on Tuesday — as an industry report pointed to a sizable drop in US crude stockpiles, with tensions in the Middle East still simmering in the background.】

item.title: 中国科技竞争对手迎头赶上，腾讯回购计划成焦点
item.description: 在本周三公布季度业绩期间，投资者将密切关注腾讯控股有限公司有关回购计划的任何评论，因为其竞争对手正在追赶其支出水平。【原文：Investors will scrutinize any comments from Tencent Holdings Ltd. about its buyback plans during Wednesday’s quarterly results announcement as its competitors catch up with its spending levels.】

item.title: 日本散户投资者推高日元看涨押注，接近创纪录水平
item.description: 尽管日元回吐了过去两周的部分涨幅，但日本散户投资者仍在押注日元将进一步反弹。【原文：Japanese retail investors are betting on a further rally in the yen even as it retraces some of the gains made in the past two weeks.】

item.title: 芯片股上涨，日本股市可能连续第三天上涨
item.description: 由于美国通胀降温的迹象支持了美联储将在下月降息的猜测，日本股市可能会延续上周的历史性反弹。【原文：Japanese stocks may extend their recovery from last week’s historic rout as signs of cooling inflation in the US back speculation the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据将再现温和增长，巩固美联储减息预期
item.description: 预测人员预计，美国消费者物价月度报告将显示上月物价再次小幅上涨，这将强化人们对美联储 9 月降息的普遍预期。【原文：Forecasters expect a monthly report on US consumer prices to show another modest increase last month, reinforcing widespread expectations for a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut in September.】
